description: Use the line wrapping utility to wrap description, comment text, and other long-form fields in bw show output. Match bd's wrapping behavior.

comments.text: Added Width() to Writer interface (colorWriter returns term.GetSize, plainWriter returns 0). fprintIssue wraps description at width-2, fprintComments wraps comment text at width-4. Two new tests verify wrapping with a fixedWidthWriter test helper.

Reopening to rework: replacing hacky width-N arithmetic with indent-aware Writer. Consolidating plainWriter/colorWriter into single struct with Push/Pop indent stack. Width() auto-adjusts for current indent. Write() auto-prefixes lines.

Reworked: consolidated plainWriter/colorWriter into single writer struct with Push/Pop indent stack. Write() auto-prefixes lines. Width() subtracts current indent. Refactored fprintIssue, fprintComments, fprintDeps, cmdComments. 18 new writer tests + 2 wrapping tests. PR #42 updated.

title: Wrap long text in show output
